alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wakulla and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 952 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of St. Marks, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, St. Marks, Newport, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Tully, Plum Orchard, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Buckhorn, Spring Creek and Liveoak Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
